xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnFinancialR: 1. The Claims and benefits paid including other expenses pertaining to insurance business is Rs. 27847.85 for the quarter ended March 31, 2024 & Rs. 78313.46 for the year ended March 31, 2024. As the format does not have the particular category, it has been mentioned under other operating expenses. 2. The profit (loss) of Minority interest is Rs. 390.49 for the quarter ended March 31, 2024 & Rs. 1384.46 for the year ended March 31, 2024. The above figures have been mentioned under Exceptional items as the Cashflow Indirect sheet is auto populating the Profit before extraordinary items basis the figure populating in the Total profit (loss) from ordinary activities before tax.

xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnAssetsAndL: The Employees stock options outstanding is Rs. 2652.72, Minority interest is Rs. 13383.4 & Policyholders' funds is Rs. 278080.80 as at March 31, 2024 As the format does not have the particular categories, it has been clubbed under other Other liabilities and provisions.
